Answer this Question This question is open with pending answers, but none have been accepted yet Its because when you put a ds game on a 3ds its not compatible with the 3ds's new features, for example when using game notes you have to turn the ds game off but when using a 3ds game in a 3ds it pauses the game so you can use the features so basically you cant use the new friend code feature with the 3ds.
